contentrichtext.text: {{lunar crater data | image=[[Image:Zhiritskiy crater.jpg|200px]]| caption=Xenophon is at top center, to the north of [[Zhiritskiy (crater)|Zhiritskiy F]]. ''[[NASA]] photo''.| latitude=22.8| N_or_S=S| longitude=122.1| E_or_W=E| diameter=25 km| depth=''Unknown''| colong=238| eponym=[[Xenophon]]}} '''Xenophon''' is a small [[Moon|lunar]] [[Impact crater|crater]] that lies across the southern rim of the walled plain [[Fermi (crater)|Fermi]], to the west of the crater [[Tsiolkovskiy (crater)|Tsiolkovskiy]]. South of Xenophon is ZhiritskiyÂ F, a satellite crater of [[Zhiritskiy (crater)|Zhiritskiy]] to the south-southwest. The rim of this crater is eroded and crossed by several tiny craterlets, especially along the western edge. The interior floor is relatively featureless. This crater is located on the [[Far side (Moon)|far side]] of the [[Moon]] and cannot be seen directly from the [[Earth]]. ==References== {{Lunar crater references}} ==External links== * [http://www.lpi.usra.edu/resources/mapcatalog/LTO/lto101b4_2/ LTO-101B4 Babakin] — L&PI [[topographic map]] [[Category:Impact craters on the Moon]] {{Moon-crater-stub}}
